title: City Winery
seo_title: City Winery - WestHouse Hotel New York
seo_description: WestRoom is a private boardroom located on the 23rd floor of WestHouse Hotel, offering seating for up to eight attendees.
contents:
WestHouse is delighted to offer its Residents the privilege to enjoy an exclusive private tour of City Winery, the only winery in Manhattan.

Wander with one of City Winery ‘s  experts from the winery into their cellar and up to the Barrel Room tasting bar and restaurant, where you will sample the latest wine fresh from the barrel, and pair the wines with flavorful dishes prepared to complement your glass. This is an unparalleled experience with unique insight into winemaking - world-class wines being produced in the heart of New York City.

Choose one of the following options:

- Monday through Friday - 12pm: Private tour followed by a tasting flight of three different wines along with an entrée. $45 per person

- Sunday - 11am:  Private tour followed by a tasting flight of three different wines along with an entrée. $45 per person

- Everyday - 4pm:  Tour of winery (in a group of 20 people maximum) followed by a tasting flight of three different wines paired with cheese from the famous Murray’s Cheese. $35 per person 

Enjoy 20% savings on your next wine purchase at City Winery.

For more information and to book your tour email reservations@citywinery.com or call (212) 608-0555

Terms and conditions:

Tours must be booked at least 24 hours in advance. Partial refunds are available up until the tour's scheduled start-time, however there is 12% non-refundable service fee upon booking. Must be 21 years of age or older to participate, photo ID required upon arrival.
